title: bookmarks, error when saving
body:
### expected behaviour
when pressing save butting when editing a bookmark, the "windows" should close.

### actual behaviour
on the user interface, nothing happens.
server side, an error is reported in apache.log (xdebug is installed).

### steps to reproduce
1.  edit or create a bookmark and press save

### server configuration
operating system:

debian wheezy 64 bit

web server:  apache2-mpm-prefork 2.2.22-13

database: mysql 5.5.31

php version: 5.4.4

owncloud version: 5.0.11 (server) 1.4.1 client (on debian wheezy 64 bit + kde)

### client configuration
browser: iceweasel 23.0 (firefox)

operating system: debian wheezy 64 bit

### logs
#### web server error log


```
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php fatal error:  call to a member function numrows() on a non-object in /var/www/testdomain.it/apps/bookmarks/lib/bookmarks.php on line 299, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php stack trace:, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   1. {main}() /var/www/testdomain.it/index.php:0, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   2. oc::handlerequest() /var/www/testdomain.it/index.php:28, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   3. oc_router->match() /var/www/testdomain.it/lib/base.php:629, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   4. call_user_func() /var/www/testdomain.it/lib/router.php:127, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   5. oc::loadappscriptfile() /var/www/testdomain.it/lib/router.php:127, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   6. require_once() /var/www/testdomain.it/lib/base.php:700, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
[wed oct 02 15:45:36 2013] [error] [client 62.94.229.113] php   7. oc_bookmarks_bookmarks::editbookmark() /var/www/testdomain.it/apps/bookmarks/ajax/editbookmark.php:37, referer: http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks
```

```
n/a
```

#### browser log
```
insert your browser log here, this could for example include:

a) the javascript console log
[15:48:12.347] post http://cloud.testdomain.it/index.php/apps/bookmarks/ajax/editbookmark.php [http/1.0 500 internal server error 165ms]
